contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 13, 2000 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (2nd and 3rd Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Second and Third Section) 25 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-23-section
Stantonbury Leisure Centre Sports Hall, Milton Keynes Bands played an entertainment programme including March From Jazz Suite No2. 14 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Alan Winkle, Euphonium, Rushden Windmill Highest third section: Rushden Windmill, Richard Graves (draw 10, 181 points)
1st Prize: £300.00 (Copperad Challenge trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Festival Challenge trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Midsummer trophy)
March 7, 2011, 4:01 p.m. March 7, 2011, 4:02 p.m.
1 Harborough Band Chris Groom
2 Towcester Studio Band Adele Hudson
3 Chalford Band Steve Tubb
4 Shipston Town Band Dave Lea
Unknown Result Rushden Windmill Band Richard Graves
